mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War soldier memorial statue, head and face

The Soldiers Memorial Building was built from 1886-1890 by Civil War Veterans as a memorial to their comrades and as a free public library. After the library moved to another building in 1909, the first floor was converted into a war museum. -- https://lebanonnhhistory.org/explore-lebanon/walking-tour-of-lebanon/soldiers-memorial-building/ [work]
